trans-unit.source: Describes the type of SQL command used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource" /> controls when performing a database operation.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the type of SQL command contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType>項列舉供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>來描述中所含的 SQL 命令類型的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Text value indicates that the text is a SQL query or command string while the StoredProcedure value indicates that the text is the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 文字值會指出文字是 SQL 查詢或命令字串，而預存程序的值會指出文字是預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> text to the name of a stored procedure and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommandType%2A> property to the StoredProcedure value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>預存程序名稱的文字和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommandType%2A>內容可從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示中的預存程序值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in a corresponding text property is the name of a stored procedure.
The text contained in a corresponding text property is a SQL query or command.
